statements: DELETE FROM SalesPredictions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND prediction_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM customer_behavior WHERE customer_id = 500 AND behavior_score > 50;
DELETE FROM sales_predictions WHERE product_id = 123 AND predicted_sales > 100;
